showcase.title: Liferay Community
showcase.description: A place for the Liferay community to discover open source projects and stay updated with the latest announcements.

showcase.title: Lexicon
showcase.description: A set of principles, patterns and tools created to provide a common design framework for crafting user interfaces.

showcase.title: Clay
showcase.description: Clay is Liferay's web implementation of Lexicon Experience Language. Built with Bootstrap as a foundation, it's comprised of HTML, CSS, and JS.

showcase.title: Simple Slider
showcase.description: An extremely lightweight JavaScript carousel micro library.

showcase.title: WeDeploy
showcase.description: A modern deployment platform that lets you forget about infrastructure and dedicate your time to what really matters: building great apps.

showcase.title: Jonathan and Marissa
showcase.description: A wedding site with RSVP, present list, and gallery capabilities.

showcase.title: Marble
showcase.description: A CSS library for sleek, intuitive, and powerful UI components.

showcase.title: Electric
showcase.description: A Node.js static generator that allows you to create beautiful documentation for your projects.
